text: Jorge Perry (1908 - 29 December 1946) was a Colombian long-distance runner. He competed in the marathon at the 1932 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1908 births Category:1946 deaths Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1932 Summer Olympics Category:Colombian male long-distance runners Category:Colombian male marathon runners Category:Olympic athletes of Colombia Category:People from Boyacá Department
title: Jorge Perry
